channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Chatbot for WordPress by Collect.chat ⚡️
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Chatbot for WordPress by Collect.chat ⚡️

item.title: CVE-2024-6498|2024-09-06T16:30:58.855Z -- unknown -- chatbot%20for%20wordpress%20by%20collect.chat%20%E2%9A%A1%EF%B8%8F
item.description: The Chatbot for WordPress by Collect.chat ⚡️ WordPress plugin before 2.4.4 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when unfiltered_html is disallowed
